title: Aromatherapy - AROMATHERAPY AND HERBALISM - Reflective Waters Natural Healing - Natural Healing/Naturopath Services in Troy
description: Aromatherapy is based on the usage of aromatic materials, including essential oils, and other aroma compounds, with claims for improving psychological or physical well-being. Please allow 15-30 minutes for this session.
cleaned_text: Aromatherapy is based on the usage of aromatic materials, including essential oils, and other aroma compounds, with claims for improving psychological or physical well-being. Please allow 15-30 minutes for this session. Please feel free to contact us with any questions, inquiries or to schedule an appointment with us. We try to be quite flexible with appointment times and days, to accommodate any schedule.
